name: Basic Isometric Builder
description:
This is just a random basic isometric builder made in p5,

It might take a bit of time for the assets to load.

This is made for PC.

Use Q and E to switch between the rotations and objects.

Use left click to place and right click to delete.

 The art is from: https://www.kenney.nl/assets/furniture-kit.

(By the way, if any of you are wondering what the cover image, I don't know either)
